tabsData.label: Charges
displayData: Digital convenience Fees Rs.500/-plus taxes applicable if final loan approval obtained in web journey

tabsData.name: features
tabsData.label: Features
displayData: Advances for Crop Production , Animal Husbandry and Consumption needs with easy terms.
Effective ROI 4% p.a on prompt repayment.
No security required for limits upto Rs.1.60 lacs.
No processing fees for limits upto Rs.3.0 lacs.

data.title: Total Interest Charge During Entire Tenor Of Loan (G)
data.data:
The Total Interest charged will be based on Daily product Yearly Compounding at the rate of 7% p.a

3% prompt repayment incentive (Up to sanction limit of Rs. 3,00,000) available for timely repayment.

data.title: Other Upfront Charges (Non Refundable)-(F)
data.data:
Processing Fees -NIL

Documentation Fees - NIL

Personal Accident Insurance Fees - To be borne by applicant as & when debited in the account by insurance company.

Crop Insurance Fees -To be paid by applicant as & when debited in the account by insurance company.

Digital convenience Fees - Rs. 500 + applicable taxes (Only for final approval cases)

Other Charges - E-signing and E-stamping charges as per state law applicable (Only for final approval cases).

data.title: Net disbursement amount
data.data: Limit amount - Other upfront charges

data.title: Total amount to be paid by borrower in Year1
data.data: Limit amount + Interest + Other upfront charges.

data.title: Annual Percentage Rate
data.data: 7% per annum

data.title: Tenor of The Loan
data.data: Initially for the period of 5 year, account to be renewed annually

data.title: Number of Installment Of Repayment
data.data: Payable on demand or as per harvesting and marketing period of crop.

data.title: Installment Amount(IN RUPEES)
data.data: Not Applicable

data.title: Contingent Charges/Penal Charges
data.data: NIL

data.title: Cooling Off/Look Up Period
data.data: 3 days. No additional charges only interim period interest to be serviced on prepayment of loan(Only for STP cases where customer avails disbursement online)

data.title: Name Designation and Contact details of Nodal grievance redressal officer for any issues/complaints
data.data:
Name - Sri Pravakar Shinde,

Designation - Chief Manager

Address : Digital Lending Department, BOI, Head Office,

G Block, Bandra Kurla Complex, Mumbai - 400051

Phone number - 022 69179496
